SGC 30-$725.00 Plus $10.00 shipping. Check or money order only. Ed Hans, PO Box 307, Buffalo, NY 14207. No PayPal. New York residents must add sales tax. Please reserve via email: [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] . As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over negotiations, requests for additional scans, etc. Website below is newly updated with many prices lowered. Additional 10% discount for net 54 members through the end of 2017. Free shipping on orders over $300.00 Thank you for your consideration.
